sentences.en: "I love you," he said. — "Whatever that means," she said.
sentences.cn: 他说：“我爱你。”——她说：“你懂什么是爱吗？”

sentences.en: “我可以提个建议吗？”“当然可以。”.
sentences.cn: ‘May I make a suggestion?’ ‘By all means.’。

sentences.en: art as a means of expression
sentences.cn: 作为一种表达方式的艺术

sentences.en: Brian was prepared to use any means to get what he wanted.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩准备不择手段地得到他想要的。

sentences.en: Do you have any means of identification ?
sentences.cn: 你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He did not want his life to be prolonged by artificial means.
sentences.cn: 他不想靠人为方式延长生命。

sentences.en: He was forceful, but by no means a zealot.
sentences.cn: 他个性坚定，但绝不是什么狂热分子。

sentences.en: He's curiously innocent about what this means to other people.
sentences.cn: 关于这对其他人意味着什么，他一无所知，这一点颇不寻常。

sentences.en: higher education was seen primarily as a means to an end.
sentences.cn: 高等教育主要被看作实现理想的途径。

sentences.en: Homework should not be used as a means of controlling children.
sentences.cn: 家庭作业不应该作为约束儿童的手段。

sentences.en: I had no means of telling him I would be late.
sentences.cn: 我没有办法告诉他我会迟到。

sentences.en: It means that all the options are at least on the table.
sentences.cn: 这就意味着，至少所有的选择都已经摆到了桌面上。

sentences.en: McKen criticises the lack of explication of what the term "areas" means.
sentences.cn: 麦肯批评说对“区域”一词的含义缺少解释。

sentences.en: Now people are starting to realise that he means business.
sentences.cn: 人们现在才开始明白他不是在开玩笑。

sentences.en: Our intention is to capitalize the company by any means we can.
sentences.cn: 我们的意图是想方设法出售这个公司以获取奖金。

sentences.en: Overall, barter is a very inefficient means of organizing transactions.
sentences.cn: 总之，易货贸易是一种效率很低的交易形式。

sentences.en: Some sign languages are very sophisticated means of communication.
sentences.cn: 有些手语可以表达非常复杂的内容。

sentences.en: The drawing is transferred onto the wood by means of carbon paper.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是通过复写纸印到木头上的。

sentences.en: the means by which performance is assessed
sentences.cn: 评估表现的手段

sentences.en: The only means of communication was sign language.
sentences.cn: 唯一的交流方法是手语。

sentences.en: The window was our only means of escape .
sentences.cn: 跳窗是我们唯一的逃生方法。

sentences.en: They had entered the country by unlawful means .
sentences.cn: 他们通过非法途径进入了这个国家。

sentences.en: This is by no means out of the ordinary.
sentences.cn: 这丝毫不足为奇。

sentences.en: This means smaller banks can cream off big profits during lending booms.
sentences.cn: 这意味着在贷款业务剧增时小银行能够获得大笔利润。

sentences.en: This proposal is by no means a sure thing.
sentences.cn: 这个提议绝不会理所当然地获得通过。

sentences.en: 我一点也不穷.
sentences.cn: I'm not poor by any means。

sentences.en: 结果怎样根本没有保证.
sentences.cn: the outcome is by no means guaranteed。

sentences.en: 通过水渠将水输送到城市.
sentences.cn: supplying water to cities by means of aqueducts。

words.tran_cn: 意思是；打算（mean的第三人称单数）

phrases.tran_cn: 根本，一点也 ［用于否定句］
逃生途径，逃生出路；逃生设施；安全疏散路线
经济情况调查（对申请补助者的）

trans.tran_en: a way of doing or achieving something

trans.tran_cn: 意思是；打算（mean的第三人称单数） [ 复数means ]
